original_text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.
korean_text: 주 예수께서 말씀을 마치신 후에 하늘로 올려지사 하나님 우편에 앉으시니라

sentences.original_text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them,
he was received up into heaven,
and sat on the right hand of God.
